about_the_game:
The Autoplay Service Bot will do the money grinding for you at Blackjack so that you don't have to! What this means for you is no more betting small $1 and $5 bets just to try and get yourself a respectable amount of playable money in this game as this AutoPlay Bot will do that grinding for you!

The best part of this is that while the AutoBot will play every hand and make the best decisions based on odds of winning, you won't have to wait hours or overnight to get the fat pile of cash you want to play with! When you activate the Autobot, you'll decide what dollar amount that you want and the Autobot will continue playing hands at super fast speed until it gets you where you want to be! This means more "fun" bets and important hands that YOU get to play and less tedious $1 and $10 grinding bets just to get to the big bets that mean something!

When you take over playing hands with a big stack of cash that the Autobot has earned for you, your bets will be even more significant than ever! Since no highest balances obtained while using the Autobot will be uploaded to the Steam leaderboards, once you take over.. it will be your chance to prove you deserve to have that balance you got! You'll need to multiply the balance you start playing with by 10 to get your balance on the leaderboards just to prove that you deserve that kind of recognition and fame! Should you turn the Autobot back on, exit the game, or lose more than 75% of the Autobot earned balance, you'll fail to prove that you're actually any good at the "BJ". When you fail the BJ qualification process, you'll need to turn the AutoBot back on and start the process over.. or do it the old fashioned way and just do the grinding yourself. Grinding yourself without relying on the Autobot is always an option to always have your balance posted to the Steam leaderboards!
